_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five ways of living comfortably [an5: Consistently treating spiritual companions with kindness by way of body, speech, and mind, both in public and in private.
Living according to the precepts shared with spiritual companions, both in public and in private.
Living according to the view shared with spiritual companions, both in public and in private.
The view is noble and emancipating.
The view brings one who practices it to the complete ending of suffering.
